    • Method Detail

      • isHPA

        public java.lang.String isHPA(java.lang.String cCSS,
                              int[] id)
        Detect if the given graph is HPA. If there exits transitions 1-a-2 and 1-a-3, at most one of 2 and 3 can be strongly connected with 1 in a HPA.
        Parameters:
        cCSS - = g.conflict_node_group
        id - was obtained from calling TarjanSCC_q0 for g.
        Returns:
        Return NULL (true) if given PA is HPA; else return the conflicting group.
